name: House of the Lost Mini
description:
Can you brave the haunted house that is holding your sister hostage? Grab your slingshot and step into this nearly impossible adventure for your chance to become a legend.

== Not compatible with iPhone 4 or older ==

Your sister has been lured inside the House of the Lost, a haunted mansion that constantly changes itself to bind anyone that wanders inside. You'll have to push your skills to the limit to explore every corner of this haunted house for items and weapons to give yourself a chance to survive.

Craft new weapons like flamethrowers, firework launchers, nail guns, and laser swords.

Blast through zombies, one-eyed monsters, evil clowns, ghosts, and finally the house itself on your quest to save your sister, and all the other lost children.

Avoid dangerous traps, spiky obstacles, and bottomless pits on every level.

House of the Lost will challenge you like no other game on the App Store!

GAME FEATURES

RANDOM LEVELS
Each time you play House of the Lost you'll experience a different set of levels and challenges. Enemies will change, map layouts will be different, and the House will test you at every turn.

WEAPON CRAFTING
You'll need great weapons if you're going to survive this adventure and it will be up to you to create them. Combine weapons and items you find along the way to make crazy new weapons to aid you in your quest.

EPIC BOSS BATTLES
The zombies, monsters and ghosts that haunt these halls are deadly enough but nothing will be able to prepare you for the boss battles that await.

MULTIPLE ENVIRONMENTS
You'll find four different environments within the house that all have their own challenges and boss to face.

SECRETS GALORE
Walk through walls, track down clues, and do your best to unlock the secrets of the House. It may be your only chance at survival.

GAME CENTER LEADERBOARDS AND ACHIEVEMENTS
Think you're the best player around? Track your completion time and high score on the Game Center leader boards. If exploration is more your thing then you can try to seek out all the achievements that the House has to offer.

MORE CONTENT COMING SOON
Additional levels and environments will keep the gameplay fresh and new secret bosses will keep you searching the haunted halls of the House for months to come.
